Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<IServerPacket>
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Lobby
public class Lobby
extends Observable<IServerPacket>
Models a lobby, holding the list of connected clients, the first connected client and the number of players needed to start the game in the current lobby.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Lobby()
    Constructs a new Lobby with a random UUID, an empty connection list and the players needed to start set to -1.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addConnection​(SocketClientConnection connection)
    Adds the given connection to this lobby.
    boolean canStart()
    Checks if the Lobby can start a game.
    void disconnect​(SocketClientConnection connection)
    Remove the given connection from the Lobby, notifying all other clients.
    void disconnectAll​(SocketClientConnection crashedConnection)
    Remove the given crashed connection from the Lobby, disconnecting and notifying all other clients.
    GameConfig getCustomGameConfig()
    Gets the custom game config for this Lobby.
    java.util.UUID getUuid()
    Gets the UUID of this Lobby.
    boolean isPlayersToStartSet()
    Checks if the number of players needed to start the game for this Lobby is set.
    boolean isSinglePlayer()
    Checks if the players needed to start is set to 1.
    void setCustomGameConfig​(SocketClientConnection connection, GameConfig gameConfig)  
    void setGameConfigSet​(SocketClientConnection connection)
    Sets to true if the master player has already chosen the desired game config
    void setPlayerName​(SocketClientConnection connection, java.lang.String playerName)
    Sets the player name for the given connection.
    void setPlayersToStart​(SocketClientConnection connection, int playersToStart)
    Sets the players needed to start the game, if the given connection is not the first connection to the lobby sends an error message to the client.
    void startGame()
    Notifies all connected clients of game start.
    void terminate()
    Terminate the Lobby, disconnecting all clients.

    Methods inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable

    addObserver, notify

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby()
      Constructs a new Lobby with a random UUID, an empty connection list and the players needed to start set to -1.

  • Method Details

    • getUuid

      public java.util.UUID getUuid()
      Gets the UUID of this Lobby.
      Returns:
      the uuid of the lobby

    • getCustomGameConfig

      public GameConfig getCustomGameConfig()
      Gets the custom game config for this Lobby.
      Returns:
      the custom game config for the lobby, or null if not set

    • isSinglePlayer

      public boolean isSinglePlayer()
      Checks if the players needed to start is set to 1.
      Returns:
      true if playersToStart = 1, false otherwise

    • addConnection

      public void addConnection​(SocketClientConnection connection) throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
      Adds the given connection to this lobby.
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection to be added
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if 4 clients are already connected to this lobby

    • setPlayerName

      public void setPlayerName​(SocketClientConnection connection, java.lang.String playerName)
      Sets the player name for the given connection. If there is an other player with this name already connected sends an error message to the client.
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection that will have its player name set
      playerName - the player name to be set, if it's null or empty sends an error message to the client

    • setPlayersToStart

      public void setPlayersToStart​(SocketClientConnection connection, int playersToStart)
      Sets the players needed to start the game, if the given connection is not the first connection to the lobby sends an error message to the client. If the number given is less than the number of clients already connected sends an error message to the client.
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection that wants to set the number of players needed to start
      playersToStart - the number of players needed to start the game, should be between 1 and 4, otherwise an error message will be sent to the client

    • setCustomGameConfig

      public void setCustomGameConfig​(SocketClientConnection connection, GameConfig gameConfig)

    • setGameConfigSet

      public void setGameConfigSet​(SocketClientConnection connection)
      Sets to true if the master player has already chosen the desired game config

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Notifies all connected clients of game start.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect​(SocketClientConnection connection)
      Remove the given connection from the Lobby, notifying all other clients.
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection to be removed from the lobby

    • disconnectAll

      public void disconnectAll​(SocketClientConnection crashedConnection)
      Remove the given crashed connection from the Lobby, disconnecting and notifying all other clients.
      Parameters:
      crashedConnection - the connection that crashed

    • isPlayersToStartSet

      public boolean isPlayersToStartSet()
      Checks if the number of players needed to start the game for this Lobby is set.
      Returns:
      true if 0 < playersToStart < 5, false otherwise

    • canStart

      public boolean canStart()
      Checks if the Lobby can start a game.
      Returns:
      true if all connected clients have their name set and the number of connected clients is equal to playersToStart, false otherwise

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      Terminate the Lobby, disconnecting all clients.
